tool.name: demo2D00
tool.help:
**Description**
demo2D00 synthesizes one 2D HeLa image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (nucleoli, lysosomes, endosomes, and mitochonria) without convolution. The generative model used was trained from the Murphy Lab 2D Hela dataset. -----
**Input**
- Seed for Random Number Generator - Image Compression Algorithm
-----
**Output**
- One TIFF (.tif) file with six slices containing the nuclear, cell shape, nucleolar, lysosomal, endosomal, and mitochondrial channels
-----
**Example**
The following image is generated using the default parameters:
![demo2D00 Image]()
